colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES DPAL GSANG BAS BDAG POS BKA' SDOD, DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA MTHU RTZAL CAN DGRA LHA @008A *, ,CHEN PO MCHED DGU'I GSOL MCHOD DGRA LAS RGYAL BA'I RU MTSON ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI JONG GIR GNAM GYI RIG RGYUD STOBS 'BYOR MNGA' MTHANG GIS MNGON PAR MTHO ZHING, BLA MA DKON MCHOG LA MI PHYE DPA'I RANG GUM DANG LDAN PA THUS LAG CHI HUNG THA'I JI TSE DBANG RDO RJE LAG NAS, RGYAL BLON 'BANGS DUS MA'I LHA GSOL GYI DON DU PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL MNAN CHER MDZAD PA LTAR, MKHAS GRUB DAM PA DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA'I RGYAL KHAMS PA ^BADZRA K'IRTIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA'I SLOB BU DGE TSUL BSTAN 'DZIN BZANG PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG DKAR PHYOGS SKYONG BA'I LHA BSRUNG MTHU STOBS CAN RNAMS KYIS RTAG TU 'GO ZHING SNONG GROGS MDZAD DE YIS BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN RGYA CHER THOGS ZHING BKRA SHIS DGE LEGS PHYOG SKUN TU KHYAB PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG ,LHA RGYAL LO,, ,,)
